abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Chicago real estate magnate Cameel Halim will display his collection of stained glass windows by Tiffany, La Farge and other artists at Halim Museum of Time and Glass, slated for 2017 opening in Evanston, Ill; George Eastman Museum in Rochester acquires only known unopened boxes of Kodak film from 1888 and 1989, filling out its chronological display of photo technology history.

headline.print_headline: A Voracious Collector of Stained Glass
headline.main: Magnificent Obsession Morphs Into a Stained-Glass Museum

keywords.value: Halim Museum of Time and Glass
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A real estate magnate has invested millions of dollars in stained-glass windows, mosaics and clocks that will be in a new museum in Evanston, Ill....
lead_paragraph: A real estate magnate has invested millions of dollars in stained-glass windows, mosaics and clocks that will be in a new museum in Evanston, Ill.
